CustomField.formula: (CASE(Set_the_Agenda__c , 'Yes',2, 'No',0, 0)+ IF( Was_the_PSR_on_the_Call__c = TRUE,2,0) + CASE( AR__c , 'Yes',2, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Last_Meeting_Action_Items_with_Actual_Im__c, 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( CFS_Score__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Identify_Target_Market__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Top_of_Mind_Awareness__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Data_Collection__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Scoring_Calls__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Client_s_Pipeline__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Nurture_to_Close_Sales_Consulting_Biz__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Referrals_Additional_Services__c , 'Yes',2, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Recap_Action_Items_with_Desire_Impact__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Confirm_Next_Meeting_Date__c , 'Yes',2, 'No',0, 0))/28
CustomField.label: Calibration Call Score
